description: Private bookkeeping for freelancers, small business, or personal finances. HappyTaxes is a private, offline-first cash-basis bookkeeping app with receipt OCR. Made for freelancers, sole traders, small business, even personal finance. Track your finances, prepare for tax time, and keep your data yours. KEY FEATURES • Track income and expenses with receipts • Generate compliant Profit & Loss reports • Maintain 6+ years of records • Receipt capture with OCR (Tesseract - on-device only) • Local backup & restore (ZIP export/import) • Soft delete with 30-day recovery • Work completely offline - no internet required • 100% private - your data never leaves your device PRIVACY FIRST • No data collection • No tracking or analytics • No ads • No cloud sync • All data stored locally on your device • You have complete control over your data PERFECT FOR • Online sellers tracking income and costs • Freelancers managing business finances • Small businesses needing simple bookkeeping • Personal expense tracking and budgeting • Anyone preparing for tax time • People who value privacy and offline functionality OPEN SOURCE Source code: https://github.com/dorumrr/happytaxes License: MIT Issues: https://github.com/dorumrr/happytaxes/issues Late nights for brighter days. Created by Doru Moraru
